front.title: Segment Routing IPv6 for Mobile User Plane

abstract.t: This document shows the applicability of SRv6 (Segment Routing IPv6) to the user-plane of mobile networks. The network programming nature of SRv6 accomplish mobile user-plane functions in a simple manner. The statelessness of SRv6 and its ability to control both service layer path and underlying transport can be beneficial to the mobile user-plane, providing flexibility, end-to-end network slicing and SLA control for various applications. This document describes the SRv6 mobile user plane.
